name: A Session With A Shortcake Demo
name_original: A Session With A Shortcake Demo
description:
"Tell me, what AM I in your eyes?"

The player got into a therapist-liked white room, somehow there is talking shortcake sitting in the room, and asked such question, waiting for the answer...

This game is text-based, chatting about the topic about short people, whether you're a short or tall person, you're free to do play this game!
